subtitles:
43937 47216 People once believed
that when someone dies...

47296 51416 a crow carries their soul
to the land of the dead.

51496 54695 But sometimes,
something so bad happens...

54775 59815 that a terrible sadness is carried
with it and the soul can't rest.

59895 62814 Then sometimes,
just sometimes...

62894 67694 the crow can bring that soul back
to put the wrong things right.
112934 115327 There's a piece of glass.

120227 124546 Shelly Webster and Eric Draven.
Wedding was tomorrow night.

124626 127746 Who the fuck gets married
on Halloween anyhow?

131771 134985 - Sir, we gotta move her.
- Do it.
135345 136871 All right, guys, let's do it.

136904 139984 Devil's fucking Night.
What's the count so far?

141424 144143 - They're slacking off from last year.
- Three hours to go.

144223 148903 - Maybe they're just slow starters.
- Coming through!

153355 155575 You guys can't come in here
and take her away like this.

155635 159621 There are procedures to stick by. You guys
should have cleared this with me first.

159701 161901 - Is this the victim?
- No, it's Amelia Earhart.

161941 165047 - We found her, detective, and you missed it.
- I don't care what her name is.

165107 168421 I didn't give the order to move her.
Jesus, Albrecht.

168467 169974 I can see why they took away
your gold shield.

170021 173619 Yeah, I wasn't a big enough asshole.
Come on. Let's go.
174492 175759 All right, clear out.

177518 179339 - Shelly?
- Stand back, kid.

181498 185538 - Where's Eric?
- Just don't worry about him.
186704 188824 Tell him to take care of Sarah.

188844 192010 Look, I will.
You just, uh, lie back. Come on.

201709 203895 - You Sarah?
- Yeah.

203975 207855 Yeah, look. Your sister,
she's gonna be okay.

207895 211974 She's not my sister.
Shelly just takes care of me.
212094 213733 She's my friend.
213794 215534 Her and Eric.
217681 219760 You lied to her about Eric.

221920 224613 And you're lying
to me about Shelly.
225140 226932 She's gonna die, isn't she?

235611 241090 Now, come on.
Come on. It's okay.
242996 244496 She's gonna be fine.

262608 266487 A building gets torched.
All that is left is ashes.

266980 269374 I used to think that was true
about everything...
269407 273646 families, friends, feelings.

273800 277486 But now I know that sometimes,
if love proves real...

277526 281725 two people who are meant to be together,
nothing can keep them apart.

318400 320979 What are you,
like the night watchman?

342190 345003 You know, what this place
needs is a...
345023 347262 good natural catastrophe.

347316 351436 - Earthquake, tornado, you know.
- No, no, no, no.

351489 354715 Mickey, come on, man. You got to put
the mustard underneath first.
354795 356995 Maybe a flood like in the Bible.
357075 359994 Hey, hey, hey, let me do it.

360074 363954 There we go. All right.
How about some onions?

364495 366354 Come on. Come on, man.
Don't cheap out on me.

366394 368273 - Lots of onions.
- All right, here you go.
368635 370633 There you are, all right.
370713 372993 Now we're talking.
373380 377159 Hey, it's the Sarah monster.

377672 381352 - How do you steer that thing on a wet street?
- Pure talent. Hi.

381432 385112 Now, Sarah, she's a genuine hot dogger.
You hungry?

385138 386991 - You buying?
- I'm buying.

387452 390496 - No onions though, okay?
- No onions?
390530 393750 They make you fart big time.

400089 402429 You know, Lake Erie
actually caught on fire once...

402509 405028 from all the crap
floating around in it.
406288 408448 I wish I could have seen that.

467580 471900 - Fire it up!
- Yeah!

509414 513174 - Fire it up! We busted their machines!
- Shit!

535211 538451 Oh, oh, shit, guys.
T-bird, cop car, cop car.

545810 548289 Bad people out
on the street tonight.

553689 556082 - Damn it!
- What was that?

556129 557928 - You wait right here.
- Be careful.
557974 561408 Mickey, call it in for me!

651475 655068 - Eric?
- Department of Housing!
655128 658834 Code violations? Safety hazards?
658914 661034 Place looks fine to me.
661074 663794 Let's redecorate.
667199 669619 "Abash, the devil stood...
669673 672833 "and felt how awful goodness is.

672913 677312 "Saw virtue in her shape, how lovely."
It's pornography.
690277 692550 No, no, no, no, me first.

738384 741183 - Hey, that's good.
- That's good.

744629 748068 See if you can top that, man.
Can you top that?
748422 750262 Look at that. Look at that.

751542 755821 Here's to Devil's Night,
my new favourite holiday.

759501 761261 You go over there
and talk to your pals...
762634 764300 You sick fuck.

765227 768254 Are you out of
your motherfucking mind, man?
773759 775219 Look at that!
776732 779298 Pussies drink last, man.

780191 783519 - Fuck you, Tin Tin.
- Hey.
783985 786384 Shit ain't even loaded, man.
787024 788737 This one is.

788817 791617 Which of you Motor City
motherfuckers...
791697 795816 wants to bet me this one isn't?
796229 799616 Hey, fire it up! Fire it up!
799696 801815 Fire it up! Fire it up!
801841 805469 Fire it up! Fire it up! Fire it up!
806828 808454 Here's your shooters.

808534 810414 - Put your guns away, huh, guys?
- How ya doing?

844636 847729 - I love you.
- Say that again.
853207 854647 Restaurant.

860927 863967 - Wow, you look great.
- Ta-da!

871079 873559 - Come here!
- No, no, no!

908961 912081 ♪ Just paint your face
The shadows smile ♪
913380 916700 ♪ Slipping me away from you ♪
917613 921359 ♪ It doesn't matter how you hide ♪
922112 925312 ♪ We find you if we're wanting to ♪
926652 930331 ♪ So slide back down and close your eyes ♪

930971 934544 ♪ Sleep a while
you must be tired ♪
935257 937844 ♪ But every night I burn ♪
937916 942036 ♪ Screaming the animal scream ♪
944523 946676 ♪ Every night I burn ♪
946716 950715 ♪ Dreaming the crow-black dream ♪
955675 959714 ♪ Dreaming the crow-black dream ♪
967313 969333 Couple more rings. That's 24k.

969386 973672 24k, huh? It's 18k.
It's crap. It's probably fake.
973738 975978 Leather purse. Leather.
977118 980391 Geez. Oh, what is this, Tin Tin?
980471 984831 A blood stain that's on here?

984911 987430 I'll give you 50 bucks.
And I hate charities.
987510 990230 Now, you, take it or leave it.
991170 992950 Right there for ya.
994310 997229 Decisions, decisions.
998709 1001749 You cheap ass, chrome dome...

1001829 1004708 child molesting,
saprophyte motherfucker.
1005222 1006462 Close the gate when you go out!

1006507 1010334 Oh, I close this up
for you real good, massa.

1013300 1015507 Yeah, sit on it and twirl,
you dirty scum.

1020259 1024306 Lucky I didn't stab
your fat ass.
1039863 1044263 ♪ Someone take these dreams away ♪
1044343 1048942 ♪ That point me to another day ♪
1048982 1053502 ♪ Peculiar personalities ♪
1053582 1057541 ♪ The stretch of true realities ♪
1060501 1064420 ♪ They keep calling me ♪
1064893 1068180 ♪ They keep calling me ♪
1069700 1072699 ♪ Keep on calling me ♪
1073912 1077578 ♪ They keep calling me ♪

1124304 1127304 What the fuck you all painted
up for, crackhead, huh?
1132164 1134611 Halloween ain't till mañana.
1175138 1178165 Fuck, you murderer!

1178245 1180885 I ain't murdered nobody, man!
I don't even fucking know you, man!

1180925 1184764 - What the fuck you want, man?
- I want you to tell me a story.

1184844 1188124 A man and a woman
in a loft a year ago.

1188164 1190643 - You're out of your motherfucking mind...
- Listen!

1190723 1195363 I'm sure you'll remember.
You killed them... on Halloween.

1195443 1200202 Yeah, yeah, Halloween, yeah.
Some dude, some bitch, whatever, man.
1200242 1202602 Her name was Shelly.
1202682 1205395 You cut her. You raped her.

1205487 1211047 Shelly, yeah, yeah. I shanked
her pink ass and she loved it!

1219972 1224692 Murderer? Murderer? Let me tell you
about murder. It's fun!

1225239 1229278 It's easy.
You gonna learn all about it.

1233676 1236263 I'd like you to meet
two buddies of mine.
1238183 1239716 We never miss.

1249568 1251568 - Try again!
- Aaah!
1257148 1260355 Victims. Aren't we all?
1271299 1276433 ♪ Sometimes it rains inside my head ♪
1276506 1280597 ♪ When the words run dry ♪
1280657 1283523 ♪ The walls are breathing ♪

1284271 1288430 - Look at this mess! What's the world coming to?
- Yeah, it's a mess.
1293390 1295816 ♪ No, they don't have to take you away ♪

1295850 1298149 I got to go upstairs.
Report from the front.
1298229 1302628 ♪ No, they don't have to take you away ♪
1303194 1306354 Get out of my way, you worms!
1307294 1309133 Give me some of that over there!

1310947 1314206 Why don't you ladies come by later?
Check me out.

1314240 1319226 Hey, guess what?
Arcade Games fell down, went boom.

1319312 1322992 - Boom.
- Can you imagine that? It's tragic.

1323703 1327550 Gather your soldiers.
You're on for tomorrow night. No sweat.

1327611 1331530 - Is the man in?
- He's taking a meeting.
1359320 1362959 You're thinking about the past.
1366026 1368300 Dad gave me this.
1368333 1372078 Fifth birthday.

1372139 1376618 He said childhood's over
the moment you know you're gonna die.
1389616 1391975 Is she asleep?
1398255 1400415 I think we broke her.
1405175 1407214 I love her eyes.
1412854 1419374 ♪ No, they don't have to take you away ♪

1424391 1427430 Hey, kid,
get the hell outta the road!
1433203 1435757 ♪ I don't hate them ♪
1435762 1438184 ♪ But I know them ♪
1438210 1442609 ♪ I don't want them hanging 'round ♪
1442801 1445896 ♪ I won't roll my bones ♪
1449074 1451288 I told you to stay out of here.

1451328 1454714 So I guess you're not gonna be home
till a lot later, huh, Darla?

1454727 1458427 She's busy. Go play with your dolls
or something, okay?
1458452 1460626 I don't have any dolls.
1463120 1464667 Get some food, huh?

1464746 1467625 Somebody already bought me dinner.
The police.

1472805 1476325 "Somebody already bought me dinner.
The police."
1486657 1489776 Thirty, forty dollars.
1491070 1493083 Who the fuck is this now?
1493543 1497162 Hey! Piss off! We're closed!

1499842 1503521 Go sleep it off somewhere else, dusthead,
unless you want to get mutilated.

1511120 1515200 Goddamn creatures of the night,
they never learn.
1522832 1525499 "Suddenly I heard a tapping
1525572 1527745 "As if someone gently rapping
1527832 1530278 "Rapping at my chamber door"
1532158 1534230 What are you talking about?
1534303 1536903 You heard me rapping, right?

1537296 1541255 You're trespassing,
and you owe me a fucking new door!

1543396 1546236 I'm looking for something
in an engagement ring.

1547413 1549955 You're looking for a coroner,
shit-for-brains.
1554035 1558954 Oh, shit. Oh, shit on me!
1559034 1562041 Shit on me. Shit on me!
1569593 1571752 You're not paying attention.

1577912 1582185 I repeat, a gold
engagement ring, yes?

1583351 1587211 It was pawned here a year ago
by a customer of yours named Tin Tin.

1590196 1593715 He confided in me
before he ran out of breath.
1597789 1599555 Who's this sack of shit?

1599607 1602715 That's Tin Tin, one of
T-bird's little helpers.

1602894 1605814 I think you can rule out
accidental death.

1606014 1608693 Don't any of your street demons
have real grown-up names?

1608787 1612652 This could be a turf hit, but it doesn't
look like your usual gang crap.

1612687 1617206 Come on, Albrecht, spare me.
You're a beat cop now, so be a beat cop.

1617226 1619066 I'm supposed to thank you
for that, right?

1619599 1623198 Word to the wise:
Watch your fucking mouth.
1624105 1626425 What the hell do you call that?
1628118 1629704 I call it blood, detective.

1630011 1633091 I suppose you'll write it up
as graffiti.

1633217 1636084 You can leave
my crime scene now, okay?

1643749 1645229 - Warmer?
- What are you doing?

1645282 1647802 - Don't you know this game?
- What game? What you talking about?

1648668 1650822 Okay, the rings!
I'll tell you about the rings!

1650902 1655101 They're in that metal box!
It's under the shelf there!

1656174 1660453 Take the fucking rings then! I promise, you should...
Fucking choke on them, you son of a bitch!

1663900 1666380 - Look, it goes up to the attic.
- Okay.

1682843 1686883 Oh, it's beautiful.
I don't believe it.

1709487 1712286 - You have one chance to live.
- Take anything you want.

1712413 1715373 - Thank you.
- Take anything!

1716666 1718173 Now you're going to tell me
where to find...

1718226 1720433 the rest of Tin Tin's
little party pals.

1720458 1722293 The Pit. They all
hang out at the Pit.

1722331 1727210 T-birds's little potato-heads hang out there.
Funboy, he lives there upstairs. All right?

1728171 1731051 - Funboy.
- Oh, baby, oh.

1732715 1735014 - A whole jolly club...
- Stop! Stop!

1735048 1737648 - ...with jolly pirate nicknames!
- Please! Stop! Please!

1737690 1740549 - Jesus Christ in a taxicab!
- Hold still!
1741689 1744929 Each one of these is a life...
1745289 1747409 a life you helped destroy.
1747902 1750008 I'm begging you. Don't kill me.
1751502 1753608 I'm not gonna kill you.

1753688 1757687 Your job will be to tell the rest
of them that death is coming for them...

1765966 1768792 Tell them Eric Draven
sends his regards.

1771752 1775171 You walk outta here,
they're gonna erase your sorry ass.

1775805 1779284 You're nothing but street grease, you hear?
Street grease, you motherfucker!
1779770 1781404 Is that gasoline I smell?

1803007 1806041 It's on the house, kiddo,
you know that.
1806214 1808321 One root beer.
1810093 1812733 I can't do anything.

1812773 1817240 Your mom... technically,
she's off right now.

1824085 1828478 Police! Don't move!
I said, "Don't move!"

1829445 1831323 I thought the police
always said, "Freeze!"

1831383 1835277 Well I am the police and I say don't move,
Snow White. You move, you're dead.
1836683 1840316 And I say I'm dead and I move.
1840969 1843556 Not one more step. I'm serious.

1843709 1848056 Then shoot, if you will,
Officer Albrecht.

1848089 1850875 What are you, nuts?
Walking into a gun?

1852864 1855714 - You don't remember me?
- What are you talking about?

1855754 1859594 How about Shelly?
Do you remember Shelly Webster?
1860263 1862273 Shelly Webster's dead, my friend.

1862373 1866753 I want you to move over to the curb there,
come on, real nice and easy. Move it!

1868186 1871432 Okay, we're gonna
wait here for backup.

1871512 1875792 - It's getting too freakin' weird for me.
- Oh, it gets better.
1876085 1878191 Do you know someone named T-bird?

1878271 1882671 He had a friend who shouldn't have
played with knives. Like the coat?

1882850 1885230 You're the guy
that murdered Tin Tin.

1885310 1888670 - Check it out.
- He was already dead.

1889536 1893869 He died a year ago.
The moment he touched her.

1894350 1897469 They're all dead.
They just don't know it yet.
1898636 1899868 Get away from there!
1900250 1902948 Cops! Come on, get outta here!
1904096 1906260 Leave it! Leave it, run!
1911300 1915459 Oh, great, great.

1915498 1917978 Guy shows up looking like
a mime from hell and...

1918146 1920346 you lose him
right out in the open.

1920506 1926105 Well, at least he didn't do that walking
against the wind shit. I hate that.
1926185 1929944 Little early for Devil's Night.
1931464 1934064 You are very restless.

1934224 1937050 Just wish I was a little
hungry again, that's all.

1937156 1941236 - Be careful of what you ask for.
- Yeah, I may get it, I know.

1952341 1955261 There are energies
aligning against you.
1955567 1957741 Seeing is believing, isn't it?

1976098 1979811 Gideon's pawnshop just burned down
to the foundation.

1979878 1982298 Nobody cleared
this little event with me.

1982364 1984310 I didn't have nothing
to do with that.

1984343 1986677 I'm sure you must be
awful disappointed.

1986724 1990736 I got trouble.
One of my crew got himself perished.

1990776 1992976 - Yeah, and who might that be?
- Tin Tin.

1993056 1997455 Somebody stuck his blades in all his
major organs in alphabetical order.

1997495 1999489 Gentlemen, by all means,
I think we ought to have...

1999515 2003094 an introspective moment of silence
for poor, old Tin Tin.

2006156 2008134 You're working for me
tomorrow night, right?

2008214 2011283 - Whatever you say, I can do.
- Good.
2011349 2013363 That's very reassuring.

2013392 2017272 I still ain't heard the story
on why Gideon's is burned down?

2017653 2021932 Is that a natural catastrophe
or act of God or something?
2022571 2024331 Call it my need to know.
2056265 2058745 Let go, you creep!

2063485 2066645 You didn't even slow down,
you dickhead!
2068726 2070245 He couldn't have stopped.

2070325 2072525 He was a buttface.
I could have made it.

2074450 2077370 What are you supposed to be,
a clown or something?

2081404 2085963 It's more like surfing than skating.
I wish the rain would stop, just once.

2086855 2090215 - It can't rain all the time.
- Eric?

2106947 2111080 Don't thank me.
Are we fighting the good fight?

2111567 2115319 Double homicide a year ago.
No convictions.
2115399 2118679 Annie... look at that.

2119629 2123763 "We, the undersigned tenants of
1929 Caulderon Court Apartments..."
2123830 2125203 What is this, a petition?

2125256 2127988 Big "kick me" sign for a very nice girl
who found herself a cause.

2128035 2131682 - And the cause got her killed.
- She was fighting tenant eviction in that neighbourhood?

2131757 2137024 Shelly Webster and her nice
rock-and-roll boyfriend, Eric Draven.

2137057 2140876 You know, the last time you snooped around a case
is when you got put back on the beat.

2141244 2145184 - Yeah I know. Torres keeps reminding me.
- I bet he does.

2152461 2155114 You're going to wind up
working a school crosswalk.

2157101 2161833 You didn't get that file from me, okay?
And don't tell me you owe me one.
2163485 2164499 I owe you one!

2192715 2196435 Tomorrow night
we can get high...

2196475 2200148 and watch this whole fucking city
burn from that window.
2209367 2213286 ♪ In the motherfucking dark ♪
2217472 2220711 ♪ I don't want to believe ♪

2224558 2226545 - There's a big fucking bird over there.
- ♪ No more ♪
2233524 2234983 Come here, bird.
2235404 2237063 Hey, bird. Hey, bird.
2237143 2239383 Bird. B-b-birdie.

2239423 2241943 Here, birdie, birdie,
birdie, birdie, birdie.

2241983 2244862 Come here, birdie,
birdie, birdie, birdie, birdie.
2247382 2250461 Birdie? Hey, birdie?
2254787 2257487 What the fuck?

2263046 2267405 No, man! Don't do that! You nearly
gave me a fucking heart attack!
2269819 2272578 Don't sweat it.

2273685 2277096 It's time for you to take
your bird and leave, freako.

2285717 2289376 Take your shot, Funboy.
You got me dead bang.

2291296 2296015 You are seriously fucked up.
Did you look in the mirror?
2296095 2299455 I mean, you need professional help.
2303586 2306595 He shoots! He scores!

2316133 2320659 - Jesus Christ!
- Jesus Christ?
2320692 2322212 Stop me if you heard this one.
2322292 2325091 Jesus Christ walks into a hotel.

2330057 2332955 He hands the innkeeper
three nails and he asks...
2334129 2336410 Don't you ever fucking die?
2336643 2338803 "Can you put me up for the night?"

2343915 2348314 - Does that hurt?
- Fuck. Does it... Fuck, does it hurt?

2351202 2354482 Look what you've done
to my sheets.
2377377 2379810 I've got a gun in my pocket.

2382263 2385043 You're happy to see me,
aren't you?
2402081 2405801 Stay away! Stay away from me!

2417039 2421358 Mother is the name for God
on the lips and hearts of all children.

2421438 2426350 Do you understand?
Morphine is bad for you.

2437057 2440596 Your daughter is out there
on the streets waiting for you.

2471238 2473318 If I wanted ice,
I would have asked for ice!
2473505 2474911 Now fill it up!
2476731 2479191 Fill it up yourself, macho man.
2479271 2481830 I really need this.

2491890 2493642 You burn yourself
playing with matches?

2493709 2496056 - Fuck off.
- You have an appointment.

2496096 2498677 - Well, shit on me.
- Drink up.

2498704 2502097 This is a first.
Do I bow or do I curtsy?

2502495 2504467 Now get my friend here
a glass of blood.
2506820 2510053 Hey, good night, Darla.
2513553 2516586 You stay put right there.
2525378 2527624 Get away, steamhead.

2558126 2562280 As you can see, I'm here on the corner
of 27th Street and Washington...

2562313 2565565 the site of last year's biggest
Devil's Night conflagration.

2565619 2567859 It was exactly one year ago
that the building you see...

2567905 2571299 across the street from me
was totally demolished by fire.

2571339 2573664 The fire that was fought
by seven fire companies...

2573738 2576211 but lost the lives
of two fire fighters.

2576278 2580416 In fact, if it weren't for the constant
surveillance by the local police...
2583377 2586736 Jesus. Don't ever do that, man.
2591442 2592656 Good likeness.

2592736 2596295 I saw your body, man.
You died. You got buried.
2597435 2599009 You still have your hat on.
2601967 2603967 I gotta sit down.
2613733 2617852 are you some kind of... ghost?

2627091 2631450 I don't know what I am. I need you
to tell me what happened to us.

2633370 2637290 You took a six-story swan dive
out of a window.
2637370 2640329 She, ah, was beaten and raped.
2640409 2643249 Died at the hospital.
2643275 2644834 Hey, you asked, man.
2644889 2647222 Come on. Read the file.

2647262 2651997 Shelly Webster held on
for 30 hours in intensive care and...
2652071 2654631 her body finally just gave it up.

2654700 2658420 I saw it, man.
I couldn't do jack for her.

2668331 2669885 - Hey.
- Don't touch me!
2681957 2684258 I saw her through your eyes.

2685216 2687096 You stayed with her
the whole time.

2687149 2692388 Yeah, well, you got to
understand something, all right?

2694741 2697088 I was hoping
she'd come out of it, you know.

2697128 2699967 Give me something
I could work with.

2705014 2707413 Why didn't you do
something about it?

2707454 2710407 You think any of those people in that building,
even the ones who signed the petition...

2710440 2712460 would talk after
what happened to you?
2713959 2716919 I kept asking questions and...

2716959 2719679 finally got busted for sticking
my nose where it wasn't wanted.
2723518 2725398 This your wife?

2725431 2729710 Yeah, we, uh... Well, not anymore,
we're getting a divorce.

2734368 2738010 Little things used to mean
so much to Shelly.

2738076 2740309 I used to think
they were kind of trivial.
2740375 2743189 Believe me, nothing is trivial.

2753760 2758039 You shouldn't smoke these.
They'll kill you.

2762900 2765979 You'll vanish
into thin air again?

2769692 2771832 I thought I'd use
your front door.

2777717 2780375 I'm sorry as hell for what happened
to you and your girlfriend.

2791809 2794715 I got stabbed!
I shot the son of a bitch!

2794782 2797035 I watched the bullet hole
close by itself.

2797075 2800310 And then my business
gets blown up real good.

2800381 2803337 - Other than that, my day sucked.
- Yeah.
2803367 2806137 I saw him too. He had a guitar.

2806437 2810426 He winked at me before he jumped out
a fourth-floor window like he had wings.
2810506 2815306 He winked at ya? Musicians.

2815386 2817678 - What else did you see?
- So far I haven't heard...

2817718 2819651 shit about what you're going to do
about all this crap!

2819691 2824284 I mean, what do I get? My livelihood
got flushed away and went swirling.
2826517 2828184 You ain't lost everything.

2828237 2833116 Yeah, and maybe you're not
such a big shot either! Ow! Jesus!
2834077 2837164 Fair enough. Catch.

2840008 2842368 Say hello to the last fellow
who wouldn't cooperate with me.

2842436 2844503 What're you telling me?
